Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility tests
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad MRSASelect chromogenic medium for qualitative detection of MRSA from skin and soft-tissue wound specimens
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection of MRSA from skin and soft-tissue wound specimens, used in conjunction with other laboratory tests and clinical data to aid identification and diagnosis; not intended to guide or monitor treatment, nor provide methicillin susceptibility results
